title: What is something that seems boring at first but then seems really interesting as you find out more about it? - Quora

response.answer_text: SPACE. It is the most unique and largest thing to ever exist and I believe you can run out of your lieftime but never of the mysteries that surround space. The more you read about it , the more mysteries you will unfold and mysteries are always interesting. Black holes Dark matter Nuetron stars Supernovas Exoplanets (not a part of our solar system) like CoRot-7 b And millions of other things that you will find once you start exploring.The more you will learn, the more interesting it will become. Th reason I haven’t introduce the headings is because I hope that you’ll try to learn about atleast one of them. It is basically a never ending treasure hunt and probably the best treausre hunt ever and who knows, you might be the one to discover the next planet or the one to solve the next mystery?

Life! The moment you understand that its all about you, and when no one else would have an influence on you…you’ll surely get excited to try things out, and in the same time you’ll be great. Have a nice day & try to be yourself.
